nodes.documentation: @title Interface for the Polymath Security Token Registry contract
nodes.name: ISecurityTokenRegistry
generateSecurityToken
modifySecurityToken
registerTicker
setProtocolVersion
isSecurityToken

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership
getSecurityTokenAddress
getSecurityTokenData

nodes.documentation: @notice Get the current STFactory Address
nodes.name: getSTFactoryAddress

nodes.documentation: @notice Get Protocol version
nodes.name: getProtocolVersion

nodes.documentation:
@notice Used to get the ticker list as per the owner
@param _owner Address which owns the list of tickers
nodes.name: getTickersByOwner
getTokensByOwner
getTickerDetails
modifyTicker

nodes.documentation:
@notice Removes the ticker details and associated ownership & security token mapping
@param _ticker Token ticker
nodes.name: removeTicker
transferTickerOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@notice Changes the expiry time for the token ticker
@param _newExpiry New time period for token ticker expiry
nodes.name: changeExpiryLimit

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets the ticker registration fee in POLY tokens
@param _tickerRegFee Registration fee in POLY tokens (base 18 decimals)
nodes.name: changeTickerRegistrationFee

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets the ticker registration fee in POLY tokens
@param _stLaunchFee Registration fee in POLY tokens (base 18 decimals)
nodes.name: changeSecurityLaunchFee

nodes.documentation:
@notice Change the PolyToken address
@param _newAddress Address of the polytoken
nodes.name: updatePolyTokenAddress

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the security token launch fee
@return Fee amount
nodes.name: getSecurityTokenLaunchFee

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the ticker registration fee
@return Fee amount
nodes.name: getTickerRegistrationFee

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the expiry limit
@return Expiry limit
nodes.name: getExpiryLimit

nodes.documentation:
@notice Checks whether the registry is paused or not
@return bool
nodes.name: isPaused

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the owner of the contract
@return address owner
nodes.name: owner
